forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. North wind 10 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear. Low around 54, with temperatures rising to around 56 overnight. North northwest wind 2 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a brilliantly sunny sky, encouraging flocks of people to step outside and enjoy the mild temperatures. With a high hovering around 68 degrees, the warmth is tempered by a gentle north wind, creating a refreshing ambiance that feels both invigorating and pleasant. As the afternoon approaches, a subtle drop in temperature will usher in a cozy evening, perfect for embracing the soft clarity of the night sky. This timing invites a leisurely stroll around the city, perhaps enjoying the treasures of local bookstores or savoring artisanal coffee at a nearby café, where conversation mingles effortlessly with the sounds of the bustling streets.

While fog often perches just offshore, today it remains at bay, allowing for sweeping views of the Golden Gate Bridge and the sprawling city. The absence of the characteristic marine layer offers a rare vista, presenting a postcard-like charm to everyday scenery. Given the cool breeze, light layers will serve you well, making a light sweater or jacket a sensible addition to your attire, preparing you for the crispness that evening will bring. Engage in the serenity of the afternoon; perhaps find a quiet spot in one of the parks to read or people watch, embracing the joy of a San Francisco autumn day unencumbered by the fog.
